Reviews.Title: compra alterada
Reviews.Author: braily ollarves
Reviews.Content: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003FC1M34mal intercambio comercial.. oferto un producto y me despacho otro de menos costo! esperaba x el bb onix 9700 y se me entrego el bb bold 3 9650.. muy mala transaccion. se exige respeto a la comunidad q utiliza esta pagina de compras..

Reviews.Title: nuked phone
Reviews.Author: gerrad
Reviews.Content: this phone stop working within a month how you i get replacement for the amount of money that i spent

Reviews.Title: El telefono no es OEM
Reviews.Author: cruzgutierrez1@hotmail.es
Reviews.Content: no sirve, dicen que el blackberry es OEM y cuando lo prendes dice orange, una basura y no funciona en venezuela 3g, solo en digitel para las demas operadoras funciona EDGE, sinceramente decepcionado.......

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: jorge reigosa
Reviews.Content: I didn't have receive my product and I want to know what happen about it please.

Reviews.Title: is
Reviews.Author: henry jayaro
Reviews.Content: good night the phone is t mobile or at & t is to see if I use the 3G here in Venezuela

Reviews.Title: worst purchase ever
Reviews.Author: ra
Reviews.Content: The cel only worked for one day. Then the screen turned white. I had to pay $150 at a local store to repair it. And the cel was not AT&T.; I really regret buying this product.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Fidel Akram Hachem "DoomsDay"
Reviews.Content: The item came in excellent conditions, well packed, very nice NEW, no defect, as i expected. . . . .

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Sandro Camacho Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: el  telefono  es  excellente,  muy  rapido  para  navegar  en  zonas  WI-FI

Reviews.Title: wrond item
Reviews.Author: julio cesar rodriguez
Reviews.Content: this is for shiping is ok ,this phone look gread but i recip wrond item , i paid for blackberry bold 9700 and recip 1 blackberry curve, i live in dominican republic

Reviews.Title: articulo completo
Reviews.Author: Heindery Perea
Reviews.Content: Excelente articulo, llego en el tiempo estimado y articulo llego con las especificaciones estipuladas en la descripcion del vendedor. Muy bueno el articulo

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: edwin17m
Reviews.Content: it was an excellent purcharsed , if I get the oportunity of buying other like this i will right away!..

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: solutionz99
Reviews.Content: It isn't of downloading anything. I my as well have a $4 pay as you go phone. Oh but it's in really nice condition.

Reviews.Title: Excelent article
Reviews.Author: Lyz
Reviews.Content: Hello, I have my BB and its excellent! I love it! It's like you said "like new". Thank you very much!!!

Reviews.Title: bueno, pero
Reviews.Author: D. Torres "liz"
Reviews.Content: Es bueno pero para quien haya tenido un Bold, extrañara el tamaño de la pantalla y el sonido, las cornetas de este telefono dejan mucho que desear...No tiene la misma capacidad para bajar videos.De resto bien.

Reviews.Title: Amazing smartphone
Reviews.Author: Rigoberto Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I'm so loving this Bold2, intuitive, great apps and 3rd party apps for just about anything. My boss says he's bored of his iPhone and wishes to upgrade to a Blackberry Bold 9700 -I say go for it!

ProductInfo.Features:
Large, hi-res screen that displays over 65,000 colors
Access what's important with
trackpad navigation based on
how laptops are designed.
Easily sync data and audio files from your desktop to the BlackBerry Bold 9700, and get up to 35 hours of music playback time.
Enhance the 256 MB of on-board
flash memory by easily inserting
a microSD card.
Along with a 3.2 MP camera, the
BlackBerry Bold 9700 smartphone
features video camera
functionality.
